mapper.select: select * from attraction_info where content_type_id=#{contentTypeId} order by content_id desc

SELECT content_id, first_image, title, addr1 FROM attraction_info WHERE first_image IS NOT NULL AND first_image != '' AND content_type_id = 12 AND addr1 LIKE CONCAT(#{addr1}, '%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;

SELECT ai.content_id, ai.title, ai.addr1, ad.overview, ai.latitude, ai.longitude, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{latitude})) * cos(radians(ai.latitude)) * cos(radians(ai.longitude) - radians(#{longitude})) + sin(radians(#{latitude})) * sin(radians(ai.latitude)))) AS distance FROM attraction_info ai JOIN attraction_description ad ON ai.content_id = ad.content_id HAVING distance < #{radius} ORDER BY distance

SELECT content_id, first_image, title, addr1 FROM attraction_info WHERE first_image IS NOT NULL AND first_image != '' AND content_type_id = 39 AND addr1 LIKE CONCAT(#{addr1}, '%') ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;

SELECT content_id, content_type_id, first_image, title, addr1 FROM attraction_info WHERE first_image IS NOT NULL AND first_image != '' AND addr1 LIKE CONCAT(#{addr1}, '%') ORDER BY readcount DESC LIMIT 3;
